metadata.title: High Fashion Metal Chain Arm Clear Lens Flat Top Aviator Glasses (Tortoise Gold)
features: U.S. Standard ANSI Z80.3-2001 | CE Certefied

30 DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE AND 90 DAY LIMITED WARRANTY AGAINST MANUFACTURER DEFECTS: Our main goal is make our customers happy and provide the best shopping experience; If you are not completely satisfied with our product or your purchase please contact us, we'll be happy to help
description: Bold rimmed oversized flat top aviator sunglasses that feature a prominent metal chain arm and clear lenses. With all the distinct high fashion details its no surprise why these sunnies are loved and worn by so many celebrities. Made from acetate based frame, metal hinges and clear polycarbonate UV protected lenses.
